name: Space Dancing: EDM Beat Rush
description:
Drag the spaceship to enjoy in the world of music!
In this world, you are the captain across the galaxy. Come and drive your spaceship!

How to play:
Move your finger to control the spacecraft to move from side to side.

Attention:
- Don't touch the different colors!
- Be careful of the space faultage!
- Sometimes the color may change!

Game features:
- Fancy songs will be updated weekly!
- The easiest control, but the coolest game.
- The unique game scene is mixed with music and sound effects.
- A crushing experience full of fun and joy.
- More surprises are waiting for you!

This is the most exciting music game of 2021! Who else hasn't played it is outdated. If you like music, you will like it.
Download now! ! !

If any producer or record company has a problem with any music used in the game, please send an email to us, if necessary, we will handle the problem ASAP (including the images used).

Contact us:
Do you have any questions? Send an email to contact@badsnowball.com
